title: Chi-square statistic for social media connection

content.description:
A polling agency conducted a survey about social media in which each person in random samples of <math alttext="1,000" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mtext>,</mtext> <mn>000</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> men and <math alttext="1,000" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> women was asked what factor he or she considers to be the most important when deciding whether to connect on social media with another person. The responses are shown in the table.

Factor

Personal Friend
 Stay in Touch
 Mutual Friends
 Business Networking
 Other

Men
 <math alttext="600" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>600</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="210" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>210</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="105" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>105</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="45" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>45</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="40" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>40</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Women
 <math alttext="650" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>650</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="224" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>224</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="65" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>65</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="15" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>15</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
 <math alttext="46" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>46</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: What is the contribution to the chi-square test statistic for men who selected business networking as the most important factor?

topic.text: 8.6: Carrying Out a Chi-Square Test for Homogeneity or Independence

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Calculate a test statistic and find a p-value, provided conditions for inference are met.
